messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

issue accessing oracle sent monday december please action submit your cards for approval raised issue friday morning get error message when try log have tried clearing cache tried chrome ie get same message attached had message before had deactivated contractor but contract runs until could you investigate please regards sent december please action submit your cards for approval dear you receiving because you have cards haven submitted for approval please note enough only enter your but also make you submit your for approval take corrective actions case your submitted card gets rejected below breakdown your submitted cards please submit for approval your accordingly possible country submitted cards card status contractor saved total submitted cards submitted cards statuses explained error usually happens when you log calendar view for period longer than days then delete one entry causes timecard switch error fix you should add back for deleted or delete entire timecard using right hand side menu recreate again rejected card was rejected by one approvers please correct card entries accordingly resubmit entered status timecard when only one or few days entire timecard have entered saved cards status passed entered validation but gone next submission step for any card issues you can resolve please wait but raise corresponding incident through portal for resolutions

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT ticket**

I need to categorize this IT ticket based on the provided list: Hardware, HR Support, Access, Miscellaneous, Storage, Purchase, Internal Project, and Administrative rights. The ticket mentions Oracle access, card submission for approval, and timecard submission issues. Since it relates to application access and HR processes, I think "Access," "HR Support," or "Administrative rights" would be suitable categories. There’s a reference to a timecard approval process being used by HR or payroll, confirming it as an IT issue.**Categorizing IT ticket**

I think "Access" is the best category for this ticket since it mentions login error messages and problems accessing the calendar view and timecard system. It could also fit under "HR Support" due to its connection to payroll, but "Access" seems more relevant based on the login errors. While "Administrative rights" might be applicable for granting access, the ticket focuses on the approval process rather than rights. So, I’ll categorize it as "Access" and respond with the JSON format: {"category":"Access"}.
